name: Index Page
description:
Index Page allows you to create a new frame with thumbnails and frame names that can be used for presentational purposes as a starting screen.


See Youtube video.


How to Use:

  1. Select frames you want to add to Index page.
  2. Run the plugin.
  3. A new frame 'Index Page' is created with thumbnails and frame names.
  4. You can now manually create connections between the thumbnails and the frames.
  5. Set the Index Page as a starting frame in Prototype mode and you're ready to share.


If you make changes in your designs, just select them and run the plugin again. The thumbnails will be updated on the Index Page automatically.


Note: Current API doesn't allow plugins to create connections that's why it needs to be done manually.
